Class Library

java.lang.Object
Library
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBorrowManager
public class Library extends Object implements IBorrowManager
Describes a library with members, books, and a collection of borrowed books Allows users to add, remove, borrow, and return books
Author:
m.droz
